Package simulators

Class SporadicReporter

java.lang.Object
simulators.SporadicReporter
public class SporadicReporter extends Object
Stochastic embedding of visit sequence in continuous time, followed by generation of report times, with daily seasonality. Impossible travel is precluded by allowing no reportTimes during "travel time". In order to allow multiple report sets for the same trajectory, the continuous time embedding is logically separate from the reporting.
Author:
rwdarli
See Also:

    • embedTrajectory

      public void embedTrajectory(List<Integer> visitSequence)
      Embeds a trajectory in continuous time, allowing time for travel from place to place.
      Parameters:
      visitSequence - indices of places visited during a trajectory
      See Also:
      • MainClassFR

    • generateReports

      public void generateReports(List<Integer> visitSequence, int count, double delta, double alpha, double days)
      Generates bursty report times with heavy-tailed inter-event times.
      Parameters:
      visitSequence - indices of places visited during a trajectory
      count - number of reports
      delta - least time (exceeds 0.0) between distinct events
      alpha - (less than minus 1) t^alpha is inter-event time tail probability, up to cut-off
      days - days available for report generation, before subtracting travel time.
      See Also:
      • HeavyTailedPartialSums
